# Installieren des Venndiagramm Pakets
```{r}
install.packages("VennDiagram")
```


# Die VennDiagram Bibliothek und alle Abh√§ngigkeiten importieren
```{r}
library(VennDiagram)
library(grid)
library(futile.logger)
```


# Tidyverse und Nycflights13 importieren
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```


# erste Menge
```{r}
pk_filter <- pk_flights %>% 
  filter(!(arr_delay > 120 | dep_delay > 120))
view(pk_filter)
```


# zweite Menge
```{r}
pk_filter1 <- pk_flights %>% 
  filter(arr_delay <= 120, dep_delay <= 120)
```


# Mengen definieren
```{r}
set1 = pk_filter$flight
set2 = pk_filter1$flight
```


```{r}
venn <- venn.diagram(list(tailnum1=set1, tailnum2=set2),
                     filename = NULL)
grid.draw(venn)
```

```{r}
print(pk_filter$flight)
```
